title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Navigating office politics and intrigue wears on your nerves today. As social creatures, human beings are naturally going to scheme against each other to satisfy their ambitions. Nevertheless, you might do well to stay out of the fray for as long as you can to conserve your energy. Fortunately, youre mentally agile enough to carefully watch your words while communicator Mercury joins diplomatic Venus in your 6th House of Logistics. If someone at the watercooler tries to draw you into the latest gossip, find a polite way to decline. Focusing on your projects and leaving others to their own plots keeps the drama at bay. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
